thread.title: Kareena Kapoor shines as showstopper at fashion week
thread.title_full: Kareena Kapoor shines as showstopper at fashion week

title: Kareena Kapoor shines as showstopper at fashion week
text: Kareena Kapoor shines as showstopper at fashion week Web Report   | Last updated on February 6, 2017 at 12.40 pm Share More > Vote The actress dazzled the stage as the showstopper after 45 days of delivering her baby boy She has been in news ever since she revealed her pregnancy. She owned her pregnancy and flaunted her baby bump for a magazine cover shoot. Now, 45 days after she delivered her baby boy Taimur Ali Khan Pataudi, she walked the ramp at the grand finale of the Lakme Fashion Week in Mumbai. A photo posted by Anita Dongre (@anitadongre) on Feb 5, 2017 at 9:00am PST The 'Heroine' actress was the showstopper for designer Anita Dogre and walked the ramp for her, dressed in a white and gold dress from her Alchemy collection.
